title: What's the balance philosophy behind not being able to flash out of hyper mobile Leblanc's Chain?
body:
Just played a game as Jayce and melee E'd her back AND flashed AND swapped forms to get my speed boost yet the chain didn't break. Her W was on CD BTW. 

Someone please explain to me why this champion that can gapclose 2 screen lengths is allowed waste my 5 minute cooldown flash and still retain her chain. Why even give her a range indicator? To show me how hopeless escaping her is? 

And when I turn and decide to fight her why is she rewarded with invisibility and misdirection thanks to her passive? OK if you want her to fit her fantasy then remove her lane dominance.

Her tether range should be edge-to-center, but for some reason it's edge-to-edge

Most champions' hitboxes are much larger than their models, so it looks like they have to walk much farther out of the circle than is intuitive

As plenty of other people have said before, you're really not meant to get out of the chain. You're meant to prepare yourself for the incoming Leblanc. The main counterplay is not getting hit in the first place. "Oh but she has two dashes" I can already hear people typing, Yeah, I know. But the counterplay that is lost by dashing towards an enemy is universal, not special to Leblanc.

She's technically risking herself by using her E that close, for the easier hit. Hitting it from afar means that if she misses, she can't lock you down for another chain or guaranteed W.
even if she jumps onto you she can just use e instantly then w back and still be in tether range which is really hard to punish unless you have instant burst

This, This crap shouldn't be a thing, If she W's in to hit the chain she shouldn't be able to W back for safety while STILL keeping the tether.

Morgana's ULT is a 1050 tether radius but she is an immobile champion. Did I mention this is her ultimate?

Leblanc is a COMPLETELY MOBILE champion with a double dash and a 1000 tether radius. Is 1000 really necessary? A good Karma can position her self with this and land it without needing to be mobile.
